languages.text: Вольный Торговец заключил{mf||а} сделку с моторными вандалами, с дозволения Адептус Механикус приобретая у них добычу.
The Rogue Trader struck a deal with the Engine Vandals: with the approval of the Adeptus Mechanicus, the dynasty would purchase any pieces of technology these rovers might be willing to part with.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец заключил{mf||а} сделку с моторными вандалами, с дозволения Адептус Механикус приобретая у них добычу.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader struck a deal with the Engine Vandals: with the approval of the Adeptus Mechanicus, the dynasty would purchase any pieces of technology these rovers might be willing to part with. This patronage sent murmurs of unrest among the population who feels threatened by such an alliance.

The Rogue Trader struck a deal with the Engine Vandals: with the approval of the Adeptus Mechanicus, the dynasty would purchase any pieces of technology these rovers might be willing to part with. This patronage sent murmurs of unrest among the population who feels threatened by such an alliance.

The Rogue Trader struck a deal with the Engine Vandals: with the approval of the Adeptus Mechanicus, the dynasty would purchase any pieces of technology these rovers might be willing to part with.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a conclu un marché avec les Vandales mécaniques : avec l'approbation de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, la dynastie achèterait toute technologie dont ces vagabonds accepteraient de se séparer.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader struck a deal with the Engine Vandals: with the approval of the Adeptus Mechanicus, the dynasty would purchase any pieces of technology these rovers might be willing to part with.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a conclu un marché avec les Vandales mécaniques : avec l'approbation de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, la dynastie achèterait toute technologie dont ces vagabonds accepteraient de se séparer. Cet arrangement a suscité de l'émoi au sein de la population, qui se sent menacée par une telle alliance.

languages.text: 自由開拓者はエンジン破壊者たちと協定を結んだ。帝国技術局の承認を得て、王朝がエンジン破壊者たちが手放す可能性のあるテクノロジーを購入するというものだ。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader struck a deal with the Engine Vandals: with the approval of the Adeptus Mechanicus, the dynasty would purchase any pieces of technology these rovers might be willing to part with.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者はエンジン破壊者たちと協定を結んだ。帝国技術局の承認を得て、王朝がエンジン破壊者たちが手放す可能性のあるテクノロジーを購入するというものだ。

languages.text: 行商浪人与引擎破坏者达成了一项协议，在机械修会的批准下，贸易王朝将买下星际掠夺者自愿放弃的技术造物。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader struck a deal with the Engine Vandals: with the approval of the Adeptus Mechanicus, the dynasty would purchase any pieces of technology these rovers might be willing to part with.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人与引擎破坏者达成了一项协议，在机械修会的批准下，贸易王朝将买下星际掠夺者自愿放弃的技术造物。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente llegó a un acuerdo con los Vándalos del Motor. Con la aprobación del Adeptus Mechanicus, la dinastía compraría cualquier pieza tecnológica de la que estos vagabundos estuvieran dispuestos a desprenderse.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader struck a deal with the Engine Vandals: with the approval of the Adeptus Mechanicus, the dynasty would purchase any pieces of technology these rovers might be willing to part with.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente llegó a un acuerdo con los Vándalos del Motor. Con la aprobación del Adeptus Mechanicus, la dinastía compraría cualquier pieza tecnológica de la que estos vagabundos estuvieran dispuestos a desprenderse.

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} ist einen Handel mit den Maschinenvandalen eingegangen: Mit Genehmigung des Adeptus Mechanicus kauft die Dynastie sämtliche technologischen Gegenstände, die die Gruppe abzugeben bereit ist.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader struck a deal with the Engine Vandals: with the approval of the Adeptus Mechanicus, the dynasty would purchase any pieces of technology these rovers might be willing to part with.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} ist einen Handel mit den Maschinenvandalen eingegangen: Mit Genehmigung des Adeptus Mechanicus kauft die Dynastie sämtliche technologischen Gegenstände, die die Gruppe abzugeben bereit ist. Diese Vereinbarung hat unter der Bevölkerung für großen Unmut gesorgt. Die Bürger fühlen sich durch ein solches Bündnis bedroht.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, Makine Vandalları ile bir anlaşma yaptı: Adeptus Mechanicus'un onayıyla Hanedanlık, bu çetelerin elden çıkarmaya razı olduğu her türlü teknolojik parçayı satın alacaktı.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader struck a deal with the Engine Vandals: with the approval of the Adeptus Mechanicus, the dynasty would purchase any pieces of technology these rovers might be willing to part with.
